journeyIntro.overview: Gran Turismo 7 is a racing simulation with 54 trophies focused on career progression, license tests, circuit experiences, and extensive driving challenges. The platinum requires patience due to grinding for credits, mileage trophies, and waiting for legendary cars to appear in the rotating shop.
journeyIntro.recommendedApproach: Start with the Cafe Menu Books to unlock content and earn cars. Complete all license tests for gold. Work on circuit experiences alongside the career. The legendary cars and mileage trophies will take the longest - start Sport Mode races early to accumulate online distance.
warnings: Online connection required for most features
Three Legendary Cars trophy requires specific cars that rotate in the Legend shop - can take weeks
Mileage trophies require significant grinding (Route 66 = 2,451 miles)
Online mileage trophies require playing with others (The Autobahn = 8,197 miles combined)

trophies.name: Gran Turismo Platinum Trophy
trophies.description: Unlock all other trophies in the game
trophies.guide: Earn all 53 other trophies. The longest requirements are the legendary cars, mileage trophies, and license gold medals.
trophies.walkthrough: Focus on completing the Cafe menus first to unlock cars and tracks. Work on licenses and circuit experiences. Grind credits for legendary cars. The online mileage trophies will take the longest.

trophies.name: Hard Work Pays Off
trophies.description: Earned gold in all licenses
trophies.guide: Achieve gold rank in every license test across all license categories.
trophies.walkthrough: License tests have strict time requirements. Practice each test and learn the optimal racing line. You can retry unlimited times. Some tests are very challenging but all are achievable with practice.

trophies.name: Finale
trophies.description: Fulfilled requirements for ending
trophies.guide: Complete all 39 Menu Books in the Cafe to finish the main career mode.
trophies.walkthrough: Menu Books are the main progression system. Each requires collecting specific cars by winning races or purchasing them. Complete all 39 to see the credits roll.

trophies.name: Circuit Master
trophies.description: Complete 15 tracks (all sectors) in Circuit Experience
trophies.guide: Complete all sectors on 15 different tracks in Circuit Experience mode.
trophies.walkthrough: Circuit Experience teaches you each track sector by sector. Complete all sectors of a track to master it. You need 15 different tracks for this trophy.

trophies.name: Going the Distance Together: The Autobahn
trophies.description: Driving with other players online, match the distance covered by the entire German Autobahn network (8,197 miles)
trophies.guide: Accumulate 8,197 miles (13,191 km) of combined online driving with other players.
trophies.walkthrough: This counts your mileage when racing online with others in Sport Mode or lobbies. This is a long grind - start Sport Mode racing early and consistently.

trophies.name: Speed Archdemon
trophies.description: Reach a speed of 373 mph
trophies.guide: Hit 373 mph (600 km/h) in any car. Requires the Tomahawk VGT on Special Stage Route X.
trophies.walkthrough: Purchase the Dodge SRT Tomahawk VGT from Brand Central. Go to Special Stage Route X (unlocked through menus). Use the long straight and hit nitrous in 7th gear to break 373 mph.

trophies.name: Three Legendary Cars
trophies.description: Acquire three legendary race cars that were once destined to win 24 hour races
trophies.guide: Purchase the Ford Mark IV Race Car, Ferrari 330 P4 Race Car, and Jaguar XJ13 Race Car from the Legend Cars dealership.
trophies.walkthrough: These three specific cars rotate in the Legend Cars shop. Check daily as they appear randomly. Total cost is approximately 25 million credits. This can take 1-6 weeks depending on rotation luck.

trophies.name: Living Your Car Life
trophies.description: Started the first menu
trophies.guide: Begin your first Menu Book in the Cafe. Unlocks at the very start of the game.

trophies.name: Student of Motoring History
trophies.description: Complete the first car collecting menu in Cafe mode
trophies.guide: Complete Menu Book #1 by collecting the required cars through races or purchases.

trophies.name: A Taste of Tuning
trophies.description: Buy and equip tuning parts
trophies.guide: Purchase any tuning parts from GT Auto or Tuning Shop and install them on a car.

trophies.name: A Bit of a Boost
trophies.description: Purchase a turbo or supercharger 10 times
trophies.guide: Buy turbo or supercharger upgrades 10 times total across any cars.
trophies.walkthrough: Can be done on the same car multiple times by selling and rebuying, or across multiple vehicles.

trophies.name: Looking Good
trophies.description: Buy and equip aerodynamic parts
trophies.guide: Purchase and install aerodynamic parts (wings, splitters, etc.) on any car.

trophies.name: Warning: Wide Load!
trophies.description: Fit a wide body
trophies.guide: Purchase and install a wide body kit on a compatible car from GT Auto.

trophies.name: Toughening Up
trophies.description: Increase a car's body rigidity 10 times
trophies.guide: Purchase body rigidity upgrades 10 times from the Tuning Shop (not GT Auto restoration).
trophies.walkthrough: Go to the Tuning Shop and buy the body rigidity upgrade for 10 different cars, or buy/sell/rebuy on fewer cars.

trophies.name: Wheely Good Fun
trophies.description: Buy 10 sets of wheels
trophies.guide: Purchase 10 different wheel sets from GT Auto.

trophies.name: Squeaky Clean
trophies.description: Wash a car 10 times
trophies.guide: Use the car wash at GT Auto 10 times.
trophies.walkthrough: After racing, cars get dirty. Visit GT Auto and wash your car 10 times total.

trophies.name: Firm Favorite
trophies.description: Buy the same car 10 times
trophies.guide: Purchase the same car model 10 times.
trophies.walkthrough: The cheapest option is the Racing Kart 125 Shifter from Gran Turismo in Brand Central - costs only 10,000 credits each. Buy it 10 times for 100,000 total.
trophies.farmingTip: Racing Kart 125 Shifter from Gran Turismo brand - 10,000 credits each

trophies.name: Heavy Haulage
trophies.description: Buy a pickup truck
trophies.guide: Purchase any pickup truck from the dealerships.
trophies.walkthrough: Several pickup trucks are available - check Toyota, Chevrolet, or Ford in Brand Central.

trophies.name: Safety First
trophies.description: Buy a safety car
trophies.guide: Purchase the Mercedes-AMG GT Safety Car or similar official safety car.

trophies.name: Let's Go Carbon Neutral!
trophies.description: Buy an electric car
trophies.guide: Purchase any electric vehicle from the dealerships.
trophies.walkthrough: Options include Tesla, Porsche Taycan, or various other EVs in Brand Central.

trophies.name: Living with a Legend
trophies.description: Buy a car at the legends dealership
trophies.guide: Purchase any car from the Legend Cars dealership.
trophies.walkthrough: Legend Cars features classic and rare vehicles. Prices vary from hundreds of thousands to millions. Buy any one car.

trophies.name: Formula First Timer
trophies.description: Drive a formula car
trophies.guide: Drive any open-wheel formula car in a race or time trial.
trophies.walkthrough: You'll receive a Super Formula car through Menu Book progression, or can purchase one from Brand Central.

trophies.name: Motor Mania
trophies.description: Store at least 50 cars in your Garage
trophies.guide: Have 50 cars in your garage at the same time.
trophies.walkthrough: Through Menu Book completion and purchases, you'll accumulate cars. Keep at least 50 in your garage.

trophies.name: No Car, No Life
trophies.description: Store at least 100 cars in your Garage
trophies.guide: Have 100 cars in your garage at the same time.
trophies.walkthrough: After completing all Menu Books, you should have 80-85 cars. Purchase additional cheap cars to reach 100.

trophies.name: Fully Licensed
trophies.description: Earn all licenses
trophies.guide: Pass all license tests at any rank (bronze or better).
trophies.walkthrough: Complete all tests in B, A, International B, International A, and S licenses. You just need to pass - gold not required for this trophy.

trophies.name: Rain Royalty
trophies.description: Acquire your rain license
trophies.guide: Complete the rain license tests that unlock during career progression.

trophies.name: The First Step to Mastery
trophies.description: Complete a track (all sectors) in Circuit Experience
trophies.guide: Complete all sectors of any one track in Circuit Experience mode.

trophies.name: Circuit Apprentice
trophies.description: Complete five tracks (all sectors) in Circuit Experience
trophies.guide: Complete all sectors on 5 different tracks in Circuit Experience.

trophies.name: Done in 60 Seconds
trophies.description: Drive a lap of the Tsukuba Circuit in under one minute
trophies.guide: Complete a lap of Tsukuba Circuit in under 60 seconds.
trophies.walkthrough: Use a fast car (Gr.3 or better) and learn the track. A sub-60 lap requires clean driving through all corners. Practice in Time Trial mode.

trophies.name: Smoking Hot
trophies.description: Earn 10,000pts in Drift Trials
trophies.guide: Score 10,000 points in a single Drift Trial session.
trophies.walkthrough: Use a rear-wheel drive car with good power. Enter a Drift Trial and chain drifts together without crashing to build up your score multiplier.

trophies.name: Time Attacker
trophies.description: Take part in 100 time trials
trophies.guide: Complete 100 time trial sessions across any tracks.
trophies.walkthrough: This accumulates naturally while practicing for circuit experiences and license tests. Each time trial attempt counts.

trophies.name: All-Rounder
trophies.description: Win races on 10 different tracks
trophies.guide: Win at least one race on 10 different circuits.
trophies.walkthrough: This unlocks naturally through Menu Book progression as you race on various tracks.

trophies.name: Digging the Dirt
trophies.description: Win 10 races on dirt tracks
trophies.guide: Win 10 races on dirt/rally courses.
trophies.walkthrough: Dirt races appear in some Menu Books. You can also create custom races on dirt tracks in Free Run mode.

trophies.name: Podium Fixture
trophies.description: Finish on the podium ten times
trophies.guide: Finish in 1st, 2nd, or 3rd place in 10 races.

trophies.name: Moving on Up
trophies.description: Move up at least five positions in a single lap
trophies.guide: Pass 5 or more cars in one lap during a race.
trophies.walkthrough: Start from the back of a grid in a race with enough cars. Overtake 5+ positions before completing the first lap.

trophies.name: By A Whisker
trophies.description: Win a race with a lead of 0.5 seconds or less
trophies.guide: Win a race with a margin of victory of 0.5 seconds or less.
trophies.walkthrough: Slow down near the finish line to let AI catch up, then cross just ahead of them. Easier on shorter races.

trophies.name: By A Country Mile
trophies.description: Win with a lead of 10 seconds or more, in a race of at least two laps
trophies.guide: Win a race by more than 10 seconds in a race with 2+ laps.
trophies.walkthrough: Use an overpowered car for the race class and build up a big lead over the AI.

trophies.name: Clean Racer
trophies.description: Complete a race without leaving the track or any collision
trophies.guide: Finish a race without going off-track or hitting any car/wall.
trophies.walkthrough: Drive carefully in any race. Easier on a track you know well with fewer opponents.

trophies.name: No Assistance Required!
trophies.description: Complete a race without any assist setting
trophies.guide: Finish a race with all driving assists turned off.
trophies.walkthrough: Disable traction control, ABS, stability management, and all other assists. Use a slower car on an easy track if needed.

trophies.name: Fill Her Up
trophies.description: Take a pitstop during a race which features fuel consumption, then fill your tank
trophies.guide: In a race with fuel consumption enabled, make a pit stop and refuel.
trophies.walkthrough: Create or find a race with fuel consumption enabled. Drive until you need fuel, then pit and fill up.

trophies.name: New Treads
trophies.description: Take a pitstop during a race and then change your tires
trophies.guide: Make a pit stop during a race and change your tire compound.
trophies.walkthrough: In a race with tire wear enabled, pit and select a different tire compound (soft to medium, etc.).

trophies.name: Running on Empty
trophies.description: Completely run out of fuel in a race which features fuel consumption
trophies.guide: Run your car completely out of fuel during a race.
trophies.walkthrough: In a race with fuel consumption, don't pit and keep driving until you run dry. The car will slow to a crawl.

trophies.name: Round and Round
trophies.description: Drive 500 miles on oval tracks
trophies.guide: Accumulate 500 miles (805 km) of driving on oval circuits.
trophies.walkthrough: Tracks like Blue Moon Bay Speedway and Daytona count. Can be done through races or free roaming.

trophies.name: Going the Distance: Angeles Crest Highway
trophies.description: Drive the length of the USA's Angeles Crest Highway (66 miles)
trophies.guide: Drive a total of 66 miles across all your gameplay.

trophies.name: Going the Distance: Route 66
trophies.description: Drive the length of the USA's Route 66 (2,451 miles)
trophies.guide: Drive a total of 2,451 miles (3,945 km) across all your gameplay.
trophies.walkthrough: This is cumulative across all races and modes. Will take many hours of driving to achieve.

trophies.name: Going the Distance: 24 Hours of Le Mans
trophies.description: Drive the length of one complete 24 Hours of Le Mans race
trophies.guide: Drive the equivalent distance of a 24 Hours of Le Mans race (approximately 3,000+ miles).

trophies.name: Going the Distance Together: The Atlantic
trophies.description: Driving with other players online, match the distance covered by the first ever non-stop Transatlantic flight (3,610 miles)
trophies.guide: Accumulate 3,610 miles (5,810 km) of combined online driving with other players.
trophies.walkthrough: Race in Sport Mode or online lobbies. Your mileage when racing with others counts toward this.

trophies.name: Join the 200-mph Club
trophies.description: Reach a speed of 200 mph
trophies.guide: Hit 200 mph (322 km/h) in any car.
trophies.walkthrough: Many cars can reach this speed. Use a fast car on a track with a long straight like Special Stage Route X.

trophies.name: Speed Demon
trophies.description: Reach a speed of 311 mph
trophies.guide: Hit 311 mph (500 km/h) in any car.
trophies.walkthrough: Use the Dodge SRT Tomahawk VGT on Special Stage Route X. Use the long straight to build speed.

trophies.name: Sport Mode Debut
trophies.description: Finish a race in Sport Mode
trophies.guide: Complete any race in Sport Mode (online competitive racing).

trophies.name: In-depth Mastery
trophies.description: Finish 50 races in Sport Mode
trophies.guide: Complete 50 races in Sport Mode.
trophies.walkthrough: Participate in daily races in Sport Mode. You must finish the race - quitting early doesn't count.

trophies.name: Snap-Happy
trophies.description: Take 100 photos
trophies.guide: Take 100 photos using the in-game Scapes or Photo Mode.
trophies.walkthrough: Use Scapes to photograph your cars. Each photo saved counts toward this total.

trophies.name: Memento from Le Mans
trophies.description: Take a photo of an Audi R18 TDI (Audi Sport Team Joest) on the Circuit de la Sarthe
trophies.guide: Photograph the specific Audi R18 TDI at Le Mans circuit in Scapes.
trophies.walkthrough: Purchase the Audi R18 TDI (Audi Sport Team Joest) - note there are multiple R18 variants, you need the correct one (approx. 3 million credits). Take a photo at a Le Mans Scape location.

trophies.name: Memento from the Nürburgring
trophies.description: Take a photo of a BMW Gr.3 car on the Nürburgring
trophies.guide: Photograph any BMW Gr.3 category car at a Nürburgring Scape location.

suggestedOrder.description: Begin the Cafe Menu Books and get familiar with the game systems. Complete early menus to unlock tracks and earn starter cars.
Work through all license categories. Get at least bronze on everything first, then return for gold medals.
Complete all 39 Menu Books in the Cafe. This unlocks most content and earns you 80+ cars.
Master tracks through Circuit Experience. Complete all sectors on 15+ tracks.
Buy tuning parts and customize cars to unlock various bronze trophies.
Purchase specific car types and expand your garage.
Hit the speed milestones using the Tomahawk VGT on Special Stage Route X.
Complete 50 Sport Mode races and accumulate online mileage.
Accumulate driving distance and complete miscellaneous race challenges.
Save credits and wait for the three legendary 24-hour cars to appear in the Legend shop.
With all trophies complete, the platinum is yours!
